description: Try our easy to follow Coconut rice With chilli soy chicken stir fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coconut rice With chilli soy chicken stir fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g Uncle Bens lightly flavoured coconut rice

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large frying pan or wok over high heat
Season chicken with salt and pepper and stir fry until just cooked through. Remove and set aside
Heat remaining oil in the same pan. Add onion, garlic, ginger, capsicum and zucchini. Stir fry until onion is tender. Return chicken to pan with sauces and stir to combine
Cook rice according to packet instructions and divide among serving bowls. Top with stir fry and garnish with coriander and peanuts
